company.name: Shrinav
company.description: We craft exceptional digital experiences that drive growth, engage audiences, and deliver measurable results for forward-thinking businesses.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Custom websites and web applications built with cutting-edge technologies for optimal performance and user experience.

services.title: App Development
services.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications that deliver seamless experiences across all devices.

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.description: Data-driven marketing strategies that boost your online presence and drive measurable business growth.

services.title: Custom Software Development
services.description: Tailored software solutions built from scratch to meet your unique business requirements and scale with your growth.

projects.title: Heart Disease Risk Prediction Model
projects.description: An AI-based diagnostic tool to predict the 10-year risk of heart disease using patient health data. Built with interactive GUI and real-time prediction support.
projects.challenge: Enable early detection of heart disease risk through accessible, personalized, and data-driven solutions.
projects.solution: Implemented ML models like Logistic Regression and Decision Trees with a real-time GUI built using Tkinter and OpenCV for visual risk display.
results: Interactive UI with animated risk gauges

projects.title: Pet Care System - Furry FriendCare
projects.description: Responsive website for a pet care service provider with booking, service highlights, and testimonials to support pet owners.
projects.challenge: Create an intuitive, appealing, and functional website for pet owners to connect with care providers.
projects.solution: Developed a responsive frontend with booking systems, team showcases, and testimonials; backend built using PHP/Node.js with form handling and mail services.

projects.title: Spam Prediction Browser Extension
projects.description: Browser extension using machine learning to detect spam emails in real-time, providing inbox protection and filtering.
projects.challenge: Identify and block spam emails before they reach users through an intuitive interface.
projects.solution: Integrated a lightweight ML model into a browser extension framework, providing inline predictions within email clients.

projects.title: Student Management System
projects.description: System to manage student data with support for record entry, search, updates, and clean UI, suitable for schools and institutes.
projects.challenge: Simplify and digitize student data management processes.
projects.solution: Developed a structured and user-friendly desktop/web app with add, search, update, and delete functionalities for student records.

projects.title: Virtual Art Gallery
projects.description: A visually immersive online platform to showcase, manage, and purchase curated artworks from independent artists and galleries.
projects.challenge: Create a high-performance image-first platform that allows users to browse and manage digital exhibitions with minimal latency and high visual fidelity.
projects.solution: Built a React + Tailwind frontend with seamless image loading, implemented secure image uploads via Multer, role-based access for curators, and an Express backend with PostgreSQL to manage artwork metadata and user submissions.
results: Optimized image delivery using responsive components and lazy loading.
Implemented curator and visitor roles with access control.
Enabled seamless CRUD operations on artwork data.
features: Artwork filtering by artist, medium, and era
Visitor interaction via likes and comments
